meanings.sent1: The unled hiker wandered aimlessly through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The lost puppy remained unled in the unfamiliar neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The unled shopping cart decided to take a solo trip down the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: Her unled thoughts floated freely without any direction.
meanings.sent5: The unled ship drifted at the mercy of the wind and currents.

meanings.definition: Not having a leader or guide.
meanings.sent1: The unled team struggled to make decisions without a captain.
meanings.sent2: The unled group of students wandered around the museum without a teacher.
meanings.sent3: The unled ants marched in circles unsure of where to go next.
meanings.sent4: The unled flock of birds flew aimlessly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unled organization lacked direction and unity without a leader.
